data.title: A Good Pizza and a Variety of Deals
data.text: Extra Large 'The Works,' add beef.  I usually get two on a 50% off special.  They make several meals for me, including breakfasts!  Not bad for $18 including tax.  Lots of options for you to choose from.  Typical of the brand.

data.title: A matter of taste
data.text: My dauthter and her friend like the pizzas her.  I like the prices, but like my grandson like a more tradition NY style pizza

data.title: Really hot and ready - no kidding
data.text: Always consistent, always ready on time. Claudio and crew never disappoint. Fast and friendly and ready to bring lunch to our hungry staff. They don't chintz on toppings and the large pizza is large and usually a very good value

data.title: Papa John's
data.text: I always order by phone and pick up. My order is two large cheese pizza's, one granddaughter is getting over a cold, so we didn't want to go out. We used to do this a lot more often. But the granddaughters now like to go to the restaurants. Papa John's is fast, they have a good staff, and we like the Pizza.

data.title: Does not honor promotions.
data.text:
For years Papa Johns has offered $5.99 per pizza for 2 pizza 2 topping deals. We just moved to Coral Springs recently and my husband prefers Papa Johns over any other pizza place. But we can't order from this location knowing that they won't honor advertised deals. To get two medium two topping pizzas here the price difference is quite steep. Ridiculous. 

They are a franchise store not a corporate owned store.

data.title: Typical
data.text: it is what you expect from Pap John.  Pizza was good.  My fav was the chocolate chip cookie pie. So yummy.  The wings were good too

data.title: PIZZA  WITH GOOD SMILE !
data.text: As some one  who  just move to Coral springs let me say papa john have the fastest delivery time out of the local competition . I know this  because sadly on my 1st  ordered from another pizza joint. And  got let down repeatedly .When I called papa john and some one picked  up on the 1st ring I was happy.  When the delivery came fast .I  realized my mistake. Was Not calling Papa John's Pizza 1st time. And it was cheaper. So if you're debating between Papa Johns in the competitor nearby just go with your gut call Papa Johns. !!!

data.title: Pizza
data.text: Poor excuse for pizza.  Crust is not like Italian pizza, nor is the sauce any good.  The special deals almost always only offering toppings that are not appealing.

data.title: Crust was overcooked
data.text: Quick turnaround, good staff, crust was overcooked though. I would still eat there as it's the closet PJ in my area.
